title: MBTA Upzone+

title: New York Police Misconduct
description: A Drawing Highlighting Dinstive Precinct Social Networks

description: a Visualization for Dramatic Events on Population Change of the US

title: Urban Mediators
description: a web-based strategic board game to immerse stakeholders in the complexities of urban planning and management.

title: Cre8ors
description: Cre8ors is a collaborative, intelligence web mindmap tool that allows users to create, share, and explore mindmaps with AI.

title: Covid Risk Level Map
description: An interactive map records the whole process from the beginning to the end of covid risk level policy in China.

description: An innovative smart beekeeping platform designed to cater to the needs of beekeepers.

description: A tangible interface for collaborative brainstroming.

title: Silkroad Urbanism
description: A research on the urbanization of the Silk Road region and its impact on the environment and society.

title: The Third Nature
description: A research exploring the decommissioning of dams in mainland China, to address the evolving debate on their utility and environmental impact.

title: Boston Land Value
description: A GIS based project that visualizes the typologies of land value pattern and its related urban morphology of Boston, MA.

title: Communicate with Data
description: Business data visualizations that aims to help business owners understand their data and make informed decisions.

title: Exploratory Data Analysis
description: Exploring the Boston zoning remormation data using Tableau.

title: Visualization Design
description: Sketch, wireframe, and design a visualization for the US population change dataset.

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization?
description: Using persuasive and deceptive techniques to visualize the New York police misconduct data.

title: Lab 0-3: Static Page

description: Exploring the Svelte framework to build reactive web applications.

description: Designing and implementing responsive grid layouts for project displays.

description: Using Git metadata to analyze project development and team contributions.

title: Lab 8: Bikewatching
description: Studying urban mobility patterns through the lens of bikeshare usage data.

title: Lab 9: Storytelling
